summary: DLC Dawnguard's Serana Replacer, Used Pure Skin Texture and many beauty mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff7700][size=6][url=https://flic.kr/p/G43uTS][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1489/26288707632_e3382c188e_c.jpg[/img][/url]

!!My Mod is Not Lore Friendly !!
[/size][/color][size=4]
This mod will change appearance of Serana. Blue Eye Serana is Human form.
Misc, Her body UUNPPreset offered. (All my mods are using this custom body preset.)
[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]
i.Required
[/size][/color][size=4]This Mod is standalone.
1.9.32 Version Skyrim and Dawnguard.[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]
ii.Recommend[/size][/color]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]This Mod is compatible with[/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT.(Follower control mod.)[/url]
Load My mod after any follower control mod's esp.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP 32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url].
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions.[/url]
